name: Divine Knight of Triumph, Eulogias
effect:
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & turn a card from your G zone face up], draw the same number of cards as the number of your rear-guards, choose the same number of cards from your hand as the number of cards drawn, and call them to (RC). Then, if you have five or more rear-guards, you get an Imaginary Gift:Force.

name: Happiness Gathering Dragon King
effect:
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.

Then, activate all of the trigger effects of the revealed cards.

name: Holy Seraph, Zafkiel
effect:
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from your hand], choose up to three cards in total from your drop and circles other than (VC), and put them into your damage zone face up. All of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn for each normal unit put. This unit gets drive+1 until end of turn for each trigger unit put. For each card put, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it.

name: Dark Knight, Crow Cruach
effect:

If they did not retire three cards, until end of turn, this unit gets "[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire two rear-guards], and [Stand] this unit.", and [Power] +10000.

name: Golden Knight of Prosperity, Idvarious
effect:
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.

[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], put all of your [Rest] rear-guards on the bottom of your deck in any order, choose up to two cards from your hand, and call them to (RC). If you put four or more cards into your deck, at the end of that battle, [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive-2 until end of turn.

name: Soul-offering Heavenly Dragon, Jagdanarruga
effect:
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.

[AUTO](VC):When your opponent's unit is put on (GC) other than from their deck, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], retire that unit, your opponent looks at the top card of their deck, and calls it to (GC).

If your opponent has five or more open (RC), all of your rear-guards get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Rikudo Stealth Rogue, Yatsukalord

Your opponent's cards' [AUTO] abilities do not activate from this call. For each unit that was called, your opponent chooses a card from their hand, and discards it. For each card you chose that was not called, you draw a card, and all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Explosive Tyrant Magnate, Giganotopharaoh
